publication.abstract: This paper describes how to compile and use the Insight Toolkit Kinetic Analysis library (itk::ka), to perform analysis of dynamic medical images, along with a brief overview of the library source code. Supplied, are a set of interfaces to facilitate application development, application implementing a standard kinetic analysis pipeline (koala), and some sample data. Only versions of ITK4 and higher are currently supported.

comments.content: Please download the most recent version if the itkka library: version 1.01 was uploaded on 30-Sep 2014.

Version 1.3 of the itkka library now available via git: 
https://bitbucket.csiro.au/projects/MILX/repos/itkka-pub
Please download latest version (1.2) as it includes a substantial number of improvements.
